Package DAO

Class Dialogs

java.lang.Object
DAO.Dialogs
public class Dialogs extends Object
Utility methods for displaying dialog alerts and validating user inputs.

  • Method Details

    • showErrorDialog

      public static void showErrorDialog(String header, String content)
      This method contains a way to alert users to errors with input.
      Parameters:
      header - the text to be displayed as the dialog's header.
      content - text to be displayed as main content of the dialog.

    • showSuccessDialog

      public static void showSuccessDialog(String header, String content)
      Displays a success message dialog with a specified header and content.
      Parameters:
      header - The text to be displayed as the dialog's header.
      content - The text to be displayed as the main content of the dialog.

    • isInputValid

      public static boolean isInputValid(String name, String address, String postalCode, String phoneNumber, First_level_divisions selectedDivision)
      Validates input fields for adding or updating a customer.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the customer.
      address - The address of the customer.
      postalCode - The postal code of the customer.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the customer.
      selectedDivision - The selected division for the customer.
      Returns:
      true if the input is valid, false otherwise.

    • isApptValid

      public static boolean isApptValid(String title, String description, String location, String contactName, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int customerId, int userId)
      Validates fields for adding or updating an appointment.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the appointment.
      description - The description of the appointment.
      location - The location of the appointment.
      contactName - The contact name associated with the appointment.
      type - The type of the appointment.
      start - The start time of the appointment.
      end - The end time of the appointment.
      customerId - The ID of the customer for the appointment.
      userId - The ID of the user associated with the appointment.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment fields are valid, false otherwise.

    • showUpcomingAppointmentAlert

      public static void showUpcomingAppointmentAlert(int appointmentId, LocalDateTime date)
      Displays an alert for an upcoming appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the upcoming appointment.
      date - The date and time of the upcoming appointment.

    • showNoUpcomingAppointmentsAlert

      public static void showNoUpcomingAppointmentsAlert()
      Displays an alert indicating that there are no upcoming appointments in the next 15 minutes.
